title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, gather requirements from stakeholders, and create a detailed project plan.

title: System Architecture Design - Revised
description: Revised design of the overall system architecture. This includes data models, APIs, integration points, and infrastructure considerations, adhering to best practices for scalability, security, and maintainability. Performance optimization strategies will utilize modern technologies like D3.js or React for interactive and responsive graphics. Emphasis on data privacy using encryption at rest and in transit, anonymization techniques, and compliance with GDPR and other relevant regulations. User experience considerations include intuitive navigation, clear visualizations, and mobile-responsive design. The system will be designed with monitoring and logging capabilities for troubleshooting and performance optimization. Documentation on technical decisions and reasoning will be updated in a readable format for team members. Agile methodologies will be used to enable rapid iteration and feedback during development. Upon review and approval, tasks related to implementation can commence.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema to store performance metrics and related data.

title: Backend Development
description: Develop the backend services for data ingestion, processing, and APIs.

title: Frontend Development
description: Develop the user interface and data visualization components for the performance metrics dashboard.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Ensure the system adheres to security best practices and complies with relevant regulations.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and execute test plans for the backend, frontend, and integration components.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment pipeline and infrastructure for the production environment.

title: Documentation and User Training
description: Create user guides, technical documentation, and training materials for the performance visualization tool.
